TouchPlaneInteractionSettings
[System.Serializable]
public
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​Configuration.​TouchPlaneInteractionSettings

This class is a container for settings that only apply to the TouchPlane interaction. In order to modify these settings of the TouchFree Service, create an InteractionConfig, which contains an instance of this class, modify it as required, and then pass to the service using the ConfigurationManager.

Like all of the Settings classes found in this file, all members are optional. If you do not modify a member of this class, its value will not change when the instance is sent to TouchFree Service.

Properties
touchPlaneActivationDistanceCM
public float touchPlaneActivationDistanceCM { get; set }

This determines how far (in cm) the TouchPlane is from the screen surface. This represents the plane that the user must pass to begin and end a click event.

touchPlaneTrackedPosition
public TrackedPosition touchPlaneTrackedPosition { get; set }

This determines which bone position will be tracked when performing the interaction.

Variables
configValues
public Dictionary<string, object> configValues

This dictionary is used to store the edited members only, and is accessed when serializing the data for transfer to the Service.

DO NOT MODIFY THIS DICTIONARY MANUALLY

TouchPlaneActivationDistanceCM
[SerializeField]
private float TouchPlaneActivationDistanceCM
TouchPlaneTrackedPosition
[SerializeField]
private TrackedPosition TouchPlaneTrackedPosition
